hahaha it worked man, thx: by the way is it still possible to include subtitle in it? the part that matches with the part of the video?

that depends on how the subtitles are stored. Usually the subs for an avi are in a separate (.srt) file and you'd have to edit that file separately and change all the timings. I use subtitleworkshop under wine to adjust subtitle timings. Nothing else works like it...
